climbs.name: Butterflies and Bees (aka Is that you, Soapgirl?!)
climbs.fa: Unknown, first lead on bolts: Joe Hunt & Pamela Heart Nx

content.description:
At the bottom three tightly spaced bolts to keep you from getting hurt if part of the rib breaks off or you slip out of the finger locks. One bolt above after you're through the initial hard stuff. A barndoor-ish move remains then a handjam finish to the top.

This route was likely TRd before, and also possibly led on gear. It can be led on gear still but it would be a bit sketchy. All set now to be led on quickdraws! But, if you want a little more excitement, just don't use them!
content.protection:
4 bolts, anchors

You can set a nice .5 or .75 cam between the last bolt and the anchors.
content.location: Just next to the Black Corridor, you can't miss it.
